PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2018-15382018-12-06,  ,  PSPC,  , 
ActCanada Post Corporation Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the International Letter-post Items Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the INTERNATIONAL LETTER-POST ITEMS REGULATIONS in order to help Canada Post continue to meet its universal service commitment, to offer an accessible, affordable and cost-effective postal service for all Canadians no matter where they live and to operate on a self-sustaining financial basis.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2018-0273 Publication Date: 2018-12-26
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Regulations Amending the International Letter-post Items Regulations
precis: Regulations Amending the INTERNATIONAL LETTER-POST ITEMS REGULATIONS in order to help Canada Post continue to meet its universal service commitment, to offer an accessible, affordable and cost-effective postal service for all Canadians no matter where they live and to operate on a self-sustaining financial basis.
